text: Gary Halpin (14 February 1966 â€“ 23 February 2021) was an Irish rugby union international player. He played as a prop for Wanderers F.C., Leinster, London Irish, Harlequins and the Irish national rugby union team. He was born in Dublin. Halpin died on 23 February 2021 in Dublin, aged 55. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Irish rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Dublin
title: Gary Halpin
